title: The Bozo Show
overview: The Bozo Show was the longest running show on WGN-TV Chicago. It featured the cast of the original shows with sketches, cartoons (such as Rocky and Bullwinkle), a miniture game show called "Bozo's Grand Prize Game", and fun stuffs. In 1995, The show was relegated to weekends only and the show renamed as "The Bozo Super Weekend Show".
